name: GPT-4o
tagline: The most advanced multimodal AI model from OpenAI.

pricing.details: Free tier with limits, API usage is pay-as-you-go.

full_description: GPT-4o ('o' for 'omni') is OpenAI's latest flagship model, designed to handle a combination of text, audio, and image inputs and outputs. It offers GPT-4 level intelligence with significantly faster speeds and improved capabilities across different modalities, making it one of the most versatile models available.

name: Midjourney
tagline: An independent research lab producing an AI-powered image generator.
cons: Steep learning curve for advanced prompting
full_description: Midjourney is renowned for creating beautiful, artistic, and often photorealistic images from textual prompts. It operates through a Discord bot, which fosters a unique community where users can share and get inspired by others' creations. Its proprietary models are known for their distinct aesthetic quality.

name: ElevenLabs
tagline: The most realistic and versatile AI speech software, ever.

pricing.details: Free tier with 10,000 characters/mo. Paid plans start at $5/mo.

cons: Can be expensive for high-volume usage
full_description: ElevenLabs provides a premier text-to-speech (TTS) and voice cloning platform. Its AI models can generate speech that is rich in emotion and intonation, making it nearly indistinguishable from a human speaker. Users can choose from a library of voices or clone their own, offering unparalleled flexibility for audio projects.
